#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int t ;
    long long int n,ans=0 ;
    while(scanf("%lld",&n)!=EOF)
    {
        ans=0;
        long long int n1 ;
        n1=n ;
        while(n1>1)
        {
            ans+=(ceil(n1*1.000/2*1.000)) ;
            //cout<<ans<<" "<<n1<<endl;
            n1/=2 ;
        }
        cout<<ans<<"\n" ;
    }
    return 0 ;
}
